lines.value: james boyle uniacke 1799 &ndash 26 march 1858 led the first responsible government in canada as it is today or any colony of the british empire
lines.name: English

lines.value: he was the first premier of the colony of nova scotia from 1848 to 1854 serving concurrently as the colony's attorney general
lines.name: English

lines.value: the son of richard john uniacke james was born to politics and entered the colony's legislative assembly in 1832 as a conservative
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1838 he joined the executive council and became a reformer during the struggle for responsible government culminating in the 1848 election the first under responsible government which resulted in a liberal party administration led by uniacke with howe becoming more prominent after 1851 as uniacke's health declined
lines.name: English

lines.value: uniacke worked closely with joseph howe the most influential reform politician of the era and put howe in his cabinet as provincial secretary
lines.name: English

lines.value: the two politicians worked to adapt nova scotia's institutions to the new democratic forms
lines.name: English

lines.value: uniacke retired as premier in 1854 to become commissioner of crown lands and surveyor general
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1832 uniacke married rosina jane the daughter of john black
lines.name: English

lines.value: uniacke lived for years with rosina in what is now known as the black binney house which is now a national historic site
lines.name: English

lines.value: * biography at the dictionary of canadian biography online
lines.name: English

lines.value: alecko eskandarian born july 9 1982 is an american former soccer player
lines.name: English

lines.value: he is the assistant coach for new york cosmos and head coach for their reserve team new york cosmos b
lines.name: English

lines.value: while at bergen catholic high school eskandarian won the 1999-00 gatorade national high school athlete of the year award
lines.name: English

lines.value: he was also named a nscaa/adidas all american and new jersey state player of the year after leading the state of new jersey in scoring with 66 goals and 15 assists through 25 games during his senior year
lines.name: English

lines.value: he finished his high school career with 154 career goals the most in bergen county history and the third most in new jersey high school history
lines.name: English

lines.value: prior to playing as a professional he played three years of soccer for the university of virginia where he was named the best player in college soccer and awarded the hermann trophy in 2002 after scoring 25 goals a school record and 4 assists for the cavaliers
lines.name: English

lines.value: he played three standout seasons at the university of virginia and established himself as one of the all time greats at the school
lines.name: English

lines.value: he finished his cavaliers career with 50 goals including 15 game winners 113 points and 13 assists in 60 games before foregoing his senior year to go pro
lines.name: English

lines.value: during his 3 seasons at uva eskandarian was a 3-time all american 1st team all acc acc rookie of the year in 2000 and was also named acc player of the year and soccer america's college player of the year in 2002
lines.name: English

lines.value: eskandarian returned to the university during the 2010 season to finish his degree and take an assistant coaching job with the team
lines.name: English

lines.value: eskandarian played his first four mls seasons for dc united who drafted him 1 overall in the 2003 mls superdraft
lines.name: English

lines.value: during his first season he recorded three goals and two assists in 23 games
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the 2004 season after the replacement of coach ray hudson with peter nowak eskandarian saw significantly more playing time
lines.name: English

lines.value: in his sophomore campaign eskandarian led dc united in goal scoring with ten in the regular season and added two assists while scoring 4 more goals in the playoffs as dc united won the 2004 mls cup
lines.name: English

lines.value: his strong play also earned him the dc united coaches award for 2004 and his first spot on the mls all star team
lines.name: English

lines.value: on november 14 2004 eskandarian played in his first mls cup game
lines.name: English

lines.value: he helped dc united defeat the kansas city wizards and win the championship by scoring two goals in the first half just four minutes apart - the fastest pair of goals in mls cup history - and was named the mls cup mvp
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 2005 alecko's season ended early after suffering a concussion
lines.name: English

lines.value: after missing most of 2005 with post concussion syndrome eskandarian wasted no time in making his mark on the 2006 season scoring against new york in the season opener
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 22 games for dc united eskandarian recorded seven goals and two assists including goal of the week honors on 5/13 for his tally against kc
lines.name: English

lines.value: his impressive return to form netted eskandarian a commissioner's pick as an mls all star his second nod to the league's showcase event.on august 9 2006 during the 2006 summer tour of real madrid he scored dc united's only goal in a 1-1 draw with real madrid
lines.name: English

lines.value: on december 22 2006 eskandarian was traded from dc united to toronto fc for a partial allocation
lines.name: English

lines.value: on may 22 2007 eskandarian was traded from toronto fc to real salt lake in exchange for forward jeff cunningham
lines.name: English

lines.value: between real salt lake and toronto eskandarian played 23 games starting all 23 scoring 2 goals and adding 3 assists logging 1913 minutes
lines.name: English

lines.value: chivas usa acquired eskandarian from real salt lake in exchange for salary cap allocation money
lines.name: English

lines.value: this move was announced on january 18 2008 at the 2008 mls superdraft
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 2008 after missing much of the first half of the season due to surgery on a torn adductor eskandarian came on strong late in the year and finished the season tied for first on the team with five goals and two assists in just 8 starts
lines.name: English

lines.value: in a span between aug 30 and oct 4 he scored a goal against each of his three previous teams rsl toronto and dc
lines.name: English

lines.value: eskandarian was traded to city rivals los angeles galaxy on july 1 2009
lines.name: English

lines.value: chivas usa received allocation money and a third round pick in the 2010 mls superdraft in return
lines.name: English

lines.value: he scored in his debut for the galaxy on july 4 2009
lines.name: English

lines.value: the goal was a game winner as los angeles beat new england 1-0
lines.name: English

lines.value: eskandarian scored again in a 3-1 win at new york on july 16 a goal which was nominated for mls goal of the year
lines.name: English

lines.value: however the 27-year-old was injured early in the second half of the galaxy's 2-2 draw with ac milan on july 19 when the ball was inadvertently cleared into his face causing a concussion and broken nose
lines.name: English

lines.value: due to injury alecko was not medically cleared and has bren sidelined indefinitely since march 2010
lines.name: English

lines.value: he was the assistant coach for the virginia cavaliers soccer club
lines.name: English

lines.value: on june 15 2011 it was announced that eskandarian had joined philadelphia union's technical staff as their youth technical director under the direction of the program's coach john hackworth
lines.name: English

lines.value: eskandarian has played one game for the united states national team against wales on may 26 2003
lines.name: English

lines.value: he has also represented the united states at the u 17 u 20 and u 23 national teams
lines.name: English

lines.value: eskandarian was leading scorer of the olympic qualifying tournament in mexico in 2004 4 goals although the us team failed to qualify for the 2004 olympics in athens
lines.name: English

lines.value: on february 1 2013 eskandarian signed with the new york cosmos as an assistant coach joining the same club that he once watched his father iran defender andranik eskandarian play for when he was a child
lines.name: English

lines.value: eskandarian was part of head coach giovanni savarese's coaching staff during the team's historic 2013 relaunch season
lines.name: English

lines.value: during the 2013 season eskandarian helped lead the cosmos to an undefeated record at home w-d-l 5-2-0 and the 2013 north american soccer league fall season title with an overall record of 31 points from 14 games w-d-l 9-4-1
lines.name: English

lines.value: the cosmos would cap the season with the nasl soccer bowl where they defeated the atlanta silverbacks 1-0 to capture the club's sixth title of all time
lines.name: English

lines.value: eskandarian led the cosmos b squad to the national premier soccer league title on august 8 2015 defeating chattanooga fc 3-2 in overtime
lines.name: English

lines.value: the game was played in chattanooga tennessee in front of a crowd of 18227 the largest crowd ever in the united states to see an amateur soccer match
lines.name: English

lines.value: eskandarian finished his 1st season as a head coach with an undefeated record as cosmos b posted a 15-0-1 record in the 2015 npsl season
lines.name: English

lines.value: alecko is of armenian iranian descent and is the son of former iranian soccer player andranik eskandarian who played soccer professionally for the new york cosmos and the iranian national football team
lines.name: English

lines.value: eskandarian also appeared on episode 44 of keeping up with the kardashians
lines.name: English

lines.value: during the episode fellow armenian american kim kardashian was set up with him on a blind date
lines.name: English

lines.value: *national premier soccer league champion 1 2015
lines.name: English

lines.value: *north american soccer league soccer bowl champion 3 2013 2015 2016
lines.name: English

lines.value: * new york cosmos profile
lines.name: English

lines.value: abu al qasim muhammad ibn abbad or abbad i 984 &ndash 25 january 1042 was the eponymous founder of the abbadid dynasty he was the first independent muslim ruler of seville in al andalus ruled 1023 1042),dying in 1042
lines.name: English

lines.value: the qadi religious judge abu al qasim muhammad ibn abbad was named governor of seville by caliph yahya ibn ali ibn hammud al mu'tali in 1023
lines.name: English

lines.value: however with the caliphate of cordoba losing integrity the abbadids a sevillan family of arabic origins seized control
lines.name: English

lines.value: as a result later in 1023 abu al qasim muhammad ibn abbad declared the taifa of seville independent from cordoban rule establishing the taifa of seville
lines.name: English

lines.value: muhammadmuhammad
lines.name: English

lines.value: cbrt dt virtual channel 9 uhf digital channel 21 is a cbc television owned and operated television station located in calgary alberta canada
lines.name: English

lines.value: the station is owned by the canadian broadcasting corporation
lines.name: English

lines.value: cbrt's studios are located in the cambrian wellness centre northwest of downtown calgary and its transmitter is located near old banff coach road/highway 563 and 85 street on the southwest side of calgary
lines.name: English

lines.value: this station can also be seen on shaw cable channel 6 and in high definition on digital channel 209
lines.name: English

lines.value: this station is also available on bell tv channel 245 and on high definition on channel 1130
lines.name: English

lines.value: cbrt first signed on the air at 6 p.m on september 1 1975
lines.name: English

lines.value: before then cbc programming had aired on private affiliate cfac tv channel 2 now cict making calgary the largest market in canada without a cbc owned and operated station of its own
lines.name: English

lines.value: the station initially branded as cbc 9 or cbc calgary later branding as cbrt then returning to cbc 9 by 1982
lines.name: English

lines.value: cbrt was one of the first if not the first to use the network channel number branding in north america that has become commonplace in the united states since the mid 1990s
lines.name: English

lines.value: up until 2008 cbrt's calgary studios were used by the 24-hour news channel cbc newsworld as a production centre for programs including newsworld today your call and a newsworld edition of canada now
lines.name: English

lines.value: in january 2016 the cbc announced that its calgary operations would move from their long time home on westmount boulevard to a new smaller facility at the cambrian wellness centre near foothills hospital
lines.name: English

lines.value: the cbc cited the age of the facility and its opinion that it was too large for its current operation as justification for the relocation
lines.name: English

lines.value: the move was completed in october 2017
lines.name: English

lines.value: as of october 5 2015 cbrt airs over 11 hours a week of local news programming
lines.name: English

lines.value: on weekdays cbc calgary news broadcasts six 1-minute news updates at :59 past the hour from 2:00 pm to 10:00 pm
lines.name: English

lines.value: a thirty minute evening news magazine airs at 6:00 pm and a late evening newscast is shown at 11:00 pm following the national
lines.name: English

lines.value: on weekends cbc alberta news originating from cbc edmonton cbxt is broadcast on saturday evenings after hockey night in canada and at 11:00 pm on sunday evenings
lines.name: English

lines.value: cbrt also simulcasts cbc radio one's local morning news and current affairs program the calgary eyeopener from 6:00 am to 7:00 am weekday mornings
lines.name: English

lines.value: the station also produces our calgary a thirty minute weekly local current affairs program on saturday mornings at 10:00 am and repeated on sunday afternoons at 1:00 pmcbc calgary's first supper hour newscast on cbrt was named evening eye opener and later the cbc evening news
lines.name: English

lines.value: the original late night news was called night final
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1991 the cbc cancelled the local newscast on cbrt due to corporate budget cuts and began producing a provincial newscast cbc alberta news co produced and presented from calgary and cbxt dt in edmonton
lines.name: English

lines.value: following a sharp drop in ratings localised newscasts from calgary were restored in 1997
lines.name: English

lines.value: the local supper hour programs were cut to 30 minutes length in 2000 with the launch of a national and international news program canada now from vancouver
lines.name: English

lines.value: seven years later the sole calgary newscast returned to its hour long format under the umbrella title of cbc news at six
lines.name: English

lines.value: cbrt operated 16 analog television rebroadcasters in certain southern alberta communities such as lethbridge
lines.name: English

lines.value: due to federal funding reductions to the cbc in april 2012 the cbc responded with substantial budget cuts which included shutting down cbc's and radio canada's remaining analog transmitters on july 31 2012
lines.name: English

lines.value: cbrt 6 in lethbridge a mandatory market was required to go digital or be taken off the air by the transition deadline of august 31 2011
lines.name: English

lines.value: cbc had originally decided that none of its rebroadcasters will transition to digital
lines.name: English

lines.value: on august 16 2011 the crtc granted the cbc permission to continue operating 22 repeaters in mandatory markets including cbrt 6 in analog until august 31 2012 at which point the transmitter had to be converted to digital or shut down
lines.name: English

lines.value: * rob brown anchor
lines.name: English

lines.value: on april 1 2011 cbrt began broadcasting its digital signal on channel 21
lines.name: English

lines.value: on august 31 2011 when canadian television stations in crtc designated mandatory markets transitioned from analogue to digital broadcasts the station's digital signal remained on uhf channel 21
lines.name: English

lines.value: however through the use of psip digital television receivers display cbrt dt's virtual channel as 9.1
lines.name: English

lines.value: * cbc calgary
lines.name: English

lines.value: us highway 290 or us 290 is an east–west us highway located entirely within the state of texas
lines.name: English

lines.value: its current western terminus is at interstate 10 near harper and its eastern terminus is at interstate 610 on the northwest side of houston
lines.name: English

lines.value: it is the main highway between houston and austin and is a cutoff for travelers wanting to bypass san antonio on interstate 10
lines.name: English

lines.value: west of austin us 290 is a rather scenic route through the texas hill country passing through the towns of fredericksburg and johnson city and hence close to the historical sites connected with fleet admiral chester w nimitz a top commander during the war in the pacific 1941-45 and the deceased president from texas lyndon baines johnson
lines.name: English

lines.value: east of austin us 290 is a divided highway that passes through or near the towns of giddings and brenham
lines.name: English

lines.value: in austin us 290 runs concurrently with interstate 35 for approximately including the downtown austin area as well as the entirety of w ben white boulevard
lines.name: English

lines.value: at various intervals us 290 intersects with sh 71 rm 1826 mopac expressway capital of texas highway s lamar boulevard s congress avenue and along the concurrent i 35 strip sixth street loop 111 and rm 2222 and us 183 among other roads
lines.name: English

lines.value: in houston us 290 is referred to as the northwest freeway
lines.name: English

lines.value: the texas legislature officially designated this highway within harris county as the ronald reagan memorial highway in 2005
lines.name: English

lines.value: us 290 is also part of a hurricane evacuation route
lines.name: English

lines.value: that route starts at sh 6 in galveston
lines.name: English

lines.value: sh 6 is taken to us 290
lines.name: English

lines.value: then us 290 is taken to where the two highways break apart
lines.name: English

lines.value: then sh 6 is taken to waco
lines.name: English

lines.value: in harris county outside of houston state highway 6 sh 6 joins with us 290 and the two highways run concurrently until splitting just north of hempstead
lines.name: English

lines.value: the large remnant of us 290 continues to be an important highway one that connects austin with interstate 10 and from there eastward to houston
lines.name: English

lines.value: parts of us 290 in austin and near houston are multilane freeways
lines.name: English

lines.value: the freeway terminates at interstate 610 with a final westbound exit ramp for interstate 10/ us highway 90
lines.name: English

lines.value: us 290 originally had an eastern terminus in san antonio before 1935 when it was rerouted further north and extended eastward
lines.name: English

lines.value: the old highway into san antonio was redesignated us 87
lines.name: English

lines.value: prior to the interstate era it extended nearly 300 miles 483 km farther west to an intersection with us 80 now interstate 20 before interstate 10 supplanted it
lines.name: English

lines.value: much of the old route near sheffield became sh 290
lines.name: English

lines.value: other former alignments that are part of the state highway system include the fort stockton and balmorhea business routes of interstate 10 and rm 1312 between ozona and sonora
lines.name: English

lines.value: prior to construction of the northwest freeway us 290 through houston followed hempstead highway which runs parallel to the freeway approximately one half mile to the southwest
lines.name: English

lines.value: the eastern terminus of us 290 was also approximately one mile to the southeast at the intersection of hempstead highway washington avenue and old katy road
lines.name: English

lines.value: there is a small directional t interchange at this intersection
lines.name: English

lines.value: because of truncations in its length us 290 no longer intersects with its parent route us 90
lines.name: English

lines.value: toll roads are planned along segments of us 290 in houston and austin
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 2011 two members of the us house of representatives john culberson and michael t mccaul asked txdot to advocate for the relabeling of us 290 as an interstate highway
lines.name: English

lines.value: in austin the central texas regional mobility authority manor expressway along us 290 from austin to manor opened on may 17 2014
lines.name: English

lines.value: the manor expressway is signed as the 290 toll road
lines.name: English

lines.value: prior to construction of the northwest freeway us 290 through houston followed hempstead highway which runs parallel to the freeway approximately one half mile to the southwest
lines.name: English

lines.value: the eastern terminus of us 290 was also approximately one mile to the southeast at the intersection of hempstead highway washington avenue and old katy road
lines.name: English

lines.value: there is a small directional t interchange at this intersection
lines.name: English

lines.value: the interchange with i 610 and first part of frontage roads opened in 1963
lines.name: English

lines.value: the first freeway section opened in 1975
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1982 freeway main lanes completed to just inside beltway 8
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1990 the stack interchange with beltway 8 were completed
lines.name: English

lines.value: from 1985 to 2005 the main lanes outside beltway 8 were completed
lines.name: English

lines.value: the freeway was constructed to only 3 lanes in each direction but a major investment study in 2002 requested expansion to 5 lanes in each direction inside beltway 8 and 4 lanes in each direction from beltway 8 to the proposed grand parkway
lines.name: English

lines.value: it also recommended to build a new tollway along hempstead highway
lines.name: English

lines.value: in houston the harris county toll road authority is planning to construct toll managed lanes along and adjacent to the us 290 right of way to be called the hempstead tollway
lines.name: English

lines.value: us 290 has three business routes
lines.name: English

lines.value: business us route 290-f is the original routing of us 290 through the town of brenham
lines.name: English

lines.value: the route is in length
lines.name: English

lines.value: the route was designated as texas state highway loop 318 from us 290 to us 290 on january 18 1960
lines.name: English

lines.value: on february 28 1973 the section from then sh 90 westward became part of sh 105
lines.name: English

lines.value: it was established in 1990 when the mainline of us 290 was rerouted along with sh 36 around the western and southern sides of brenham
lines.name: English

lines.value: the routing begins to the west of town at an intersection with sh 36
lines.name: English

lines.value: the business route continues east into downtown on main street
lines.name: English

lines.value: before reaching downtown the route splits into two parallel one way streets main street carrying westbound traffic and alamo street carrying eastbound traffic
lines.name: English

lines.value: it passes through downtown meeting the business routing of state highway 36 and the western terminus of sh 105
lines.name: English

lines.value: at this intersection the business route turns south on market street and continues out of brenham rejoining the mainline us 290 near an intersection with fm 577
lines.name: English

lines.value: an earlier route also designated as loop 318 was designated on april 23 1957 as a loop along the old route of us 380 now sh 6
lines.name: English

lines.value: on july 18 1957 this became part of fm 880 and a spur connection
lines.name: English

lines.value: business us route 290-h is the original routing of us 290 through the towns of hempstead waller and hockley
lines.name: English

lines.value: this route was designated between 1995 and 1998 in stages as a limited access bypass route was constructed to the north of these towns
lines.name: English

lines.value: business us route 290-l is the original routing of us 290 through the town of cypress
lines.name: English

lines.value: the route was designated in 1993 as a limited access bypass was built to the northeast of the original routing
lines.name: English

lines.value: the entire route is in texas
lines.name: English

lines.value: *[http://usends.com/290.html endpoints of us highway 290]
lines.name: English

lines.value: is a hack and slash video game and the fourth installment in the popular dynasty warriors series
lines.name: English

lines.value: dynasty warriors 4 was developed by omega force and published by koei
lines.name: English

lines.value: the game is available on playstation 2 ps2 and xbox and is based on a series of books called romance of the three kingdoms written by luo guanzhong
lines.name: English

lines.value: as the series has progressed it has strayed further from the actual plot of romance of the three kingdoms but instead has given the user more input on how the storyline progresses
lines.name: English

lines.value: when it was released in japan as shin sangokumusou 3 it topped the sales charts sold over one million copies within nine days and received an average of 78 out of 100 on metacritics reviews
lines.name: English

lines.value: originally released on the ps2 in march 2003 it was later ported to the xbox in september of the same year and in 2005 ported to the pc under the name dynasty warriors 4 hyper
lines.name: English

lines.value: two expansions were released for the ps2 version of the game xtreme legends and empires
lines.name: English

lines.value: whereas xtreme legends requires the player to use the original dynasty warriors 4 disc to access all of its features empires is a stand alone game and can be played with all of its content without the use of the original disk
lines.name: English

lines.value: the game is the first in the dynasty warriors series to introduce an empires expansion pack and the second to include an xtreme legends title
lines.name: English

lines.value: these expansions are not available for the xbox version of the game
lines.name: English

lines.value: dynasty warriors 4 expands on its predecessors by adding new characters new modes of play and a completely new edit mode instead of having strict routines to follow during battle officers to some extent will have a greater reaction to the events taking place on the battlefield in the game and may react to things more often
lines.name: English

lines.value: the aim of most of the stages in dynasty warriors 4 is to defeat the enemy commander
lines.name: English

lines.value: the player must make their way through the stage defeating enemy officers and troops while trying to keep their own commander alive
lines.name: English

lines.value: some stages have secondary objectives for the player to complete to make the stage easier unlock new features or help in later stages
lines.name: English

lines.value: each playable character has their own unique weapon and individual superhuman abilities
lines.name: English

lines.value: the scope of each stage allows for each side to have thousands of soldiers in the battlefield
lines.name: English

lines.value: the game uses a fairly simple combination system so that players can chain attacks together the highest possible attack combo being 10
lines.name: English

lines.value: and new character designs and attack moves are also updated in this hit game leaving more damage and raising your characters skill up more easily
lines.name: English

lines.value: playable starting officers include liu bei zhang fei and guan yu for the shu kingdom xiahou dun xiahou yuan and cao cao for the wei kingdom and sun shang xiang huang gai and sun jian for the wu kingdom
lines.name: English

lines.value: it is possible to unlock new characters from other kingdoms as well as use a player created character in any of the campaigns
lines.name: English

lines.value: the new edit mode allows players to create an officer from sets of different features motions and weapons to use in kaiba mode the characters stance and motion are affected by their gender and the weapon the player has selected them to carry and use
lines.name: English

lines.value: the motions for the weapons are taken from pre existing officers as well as from two characters removed from dynasty warriors 4 that were in dynasty warriors 3 fu xi and nu wa
lines.name: English

lines.value: some characters are unlocked by fulfilling optional side goals most are unlocked by completing certain battles during gameplay
lines.name: English

lines.value: the maximum number of playable characters is 42 46 with created characters
lines.name: English

lines.value: each playable character in the game has the ability to equip items
lines.name: English

lines.value: weapons in the game unlike its predecessors are gained in levels
lines.name: English

lines.value: some items are only found in certain stages but is only obtainable if completing a goal
lines.name: English

lines.value: sometimes the goal may be very simple but some may be not that easy to figure out how to obtain the certain item
lines.name: English

lines.value: by defeating generals and lieutenants the player's character is awarded experience scaled by the difficulty of each officer and the amount of them defeated
lines.name: English

lines.value: this experience is allocated at the end of the level and allows the player to increase their attributes or obtain new forms
lines.name: English

lines.value: each playable officer has 9 levels to achieve with their standard weapon while a 10th level is accessible through special in game requirements and on the hard difficulty which is found to be frustrating like most games the harder the difficulty the more eager you gain
lines.name: English

lines.value: items can have a number of effects on the player such as increasing attack power defense and movement speed
lines.name: English

lines.value: you can also retrieve your health level to avoid getting killed and having game over by obtaining chinese meatbuns that at first look like onions like in any other game in the so far successful dynasty warriors franchise
lines.name: English

lines.value: you can also obtain item boost that increase a certain skill by 2 for limited time only
lines.name: English

lines.value: you can also get packs of wine and packs of chinese meatbuns in certain stages in certain locations during gameplay
lines.name: English

lines.value: as said above special items can also be unlocked by completing objectives during gameplay
lines.name: English

lines.value: special items can grant the player a statistics boost a unique ability or skill or even a ride able mount such as an elephant or horse
lines.name: English

lines.value: musou mode the main campaign mode has separate campaigns for each kingdom rather than a separate musou mode for each character as was featured in dynasty warriors 3 which made it more frustrating for the player to unlock their favorite characters
lines.name: English

lines.value: so dynasty warriors 4 mosou modes are easier for the player to unlock their favorite characters
lines.name: English

lines.value: while the storyline is still linear musou mode is rather open ended in the sense that depending on the user's actions different events will occur such as unlocking new characters for use or new kingdoms
lines.name: English

lines.value: the unlockable kingdoms in the game include the wu shu and wei kingdoms and unlockable characters include warlords who were defeated in the book that the game series is based on romance of the three kingdoms
lines.name: English

lines.value: in game features include large battlefields a large number of enemies and officers to defeat and multiple outcomes for each stage
lines.name: English

lines.value: certain levels make use of the siege engine a new feature to the series and introduce specialized siege equipment such as bridge layers battering rams and catapults to the stage
lines.name: English

lines.value: although it is not essential for the completion of stages having a siege weapon will increase morale for the player's forces and help the player succeed
lines.name: English

lines.value: the morale system in the game is similar to previous dynasty warrior games
lines.name: English

lines.value: morale is increased and decreased by performing a number of positive actions for the player's army
lines.name: English

lines.value: action that produce this effect include defeating enemies in multiples of fifty defeating enemy officers and completing special events such as ambushes siege attacks and finding enemy strongholds
lines.name: English

lines.value: morale in the game has a strong effect on the player's forces determining their strength and speed as well as their ability to perform berwald attacks
lines.name: English

lines.value: morale will also affect how the cpu characters move along through battle
lines.name: English

lines.value: example ally oxenstiernas are winning
lines.name: English

lines.value: they are more likely to charge the enemy and destroy the enemies in the path
lines.name: English

lines.value: they may or may not stop if the charging armies morale drops to losing
lines.name: English

lines.value: more chances they'll stop and stay where they are or they'll flee back to the ally side of the battlefield
lines.name: English

lines.value: occasionally when the player confronts an enemy officer the officer will challenge them to a one on one duel
lines.name: English

lines.value: if the player accepts they will be transported to a small arena away from the main battlefield where a one on one fight with the officer will take place until either is victorious or time runs out
lines.name: English

lines.value: if the player declines your morale will drop
lines.name: English

lines.value: if the player wins their morale will rise and the enemy officer will be removed from the battlefield
lines.name: English

lines.value: if you accept the officers challenge they do become more difficult to beat in the duel
lines.name: English

lines.value: dynasty warriors 4 is set in ancient china during the time of the three kingdoms era
lines.name: English

lines.value: the game begins at the fall of the han dynasty shortly before the death of emperor ling when the yellow turban rebellion led by zhang jiao begun an uprising against the empire
lines.name: English

lines.value: a number of elements in the game build on aspects of chinese mythology and there is a mix between fact and fiction as the game is built on the story of romance of the three kingdoms
lines.name: English

lines.value: many of the locations characters and events in dynasty warriors 4 are reported to have happened in chinese history although many have been exaggerated to make the game more appealing to the player
lines.name: English

lines.value: there are also some features that are historically inaccurate
lines.name: English

lines.value: the game features environments resembling that of ancient china and various items from the era
lines.name: English

lines.value: common items throughout the game include fairy wine and dim sum's
lines.name: English

lines.value: many of the stages are recreations of notable battles present historically or from the novel romance of the three kingdoms while original creations became more common with the newer installments
lines.name: English

lines.value: of course the battlefields are not exact reproductions of the original locations as newer establishments buildings and othe facilities have been built on top of them
lines.name: English

lines.value: for example he fei a key site in both the game and in the historical context has been developed and expanded into an urbanised area making an exact replication impossible
lines.name: English

lines.value: instead levels are designed to be vaguely accurate focusing more on expression of mood and effects these are not reused in every game but are instead updated in every dynasty warriors game save the games extension packages in this case dynasty warriors 4 xtreme legends and dynasty warriors 4 empires
lines.name: English

lines.value: * denotes new characters to the series * denotes new characters to the series bold denotes default characters note fu xi and nu wa were removed in dw4
lines.name: English

lines.value: although dynasty warriors 4 does allow for some player input into how the story unfolds the three main kingdoms musou modes follow the main events of the romance of the three kingdoms story
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 184 ad with the corruption and poverty within the han dynasty zhang jiao and a religious sect known as the way of peace start a rebellion within china attracting hundreds of thousands of followers
lines.name: English

lines.value: in response to this threat regent marshal he jin gathers generals from across the land to combat the yellow turban rebellion
lines.name: English

lines.value: among the volunteers for the han forces are cao cao of chang'an sun jian of jianye and liu bei
lines.name: English

lines.value: the han forces are able to destroy zhang liang who is laying siege to huangfu song at xiapi castle
lines.name: English

lines.value: they proceed to drive zhang bao out of his fortress at he nan yin and the whole han army triumphs over zhang jiao himself in ji province if zhang jiao withdraws from the battle one of the forces either wei wu or shu will defeat zhang jiao and zhang lu in hanzhong
lines.name: English

lines.value: with zhang jiao and his followers dead it is dong zhuo who seizes power within the imperial court
lines.name: English

lines.value: followed by lu bu and diaochan he enslaves emperor xian and makes himself regent in place of the deceased he jin
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 190 ad the powerful nobleman yuan shao rallies an army of warriors from across the land including cao cao sun jian liu bei gongsun zan and many fresh warriors
lines.name: English

lines.value: these forces defeat li jue and hua xiong at si shui gate and at hulao gate a year later they defeat dong zhuo and lu bu dong zhuo survives and burns down luoyang
lines.name: English

lines.value: after defeating dong zhuo liu bei and his sworn brothers zhang fei and guan yu are forced to wander the land in search of a home
lines.name: English

lines.value: since the people love liu bei cao cao sets out to destroy him
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 200 ad guan yu returns to liu bei after an escape tales making it through many gates to ships on the river
lines.name: English

lines.value: at ru nan tales liu bei is rejoined by guan yu and is now followed by zhao yun who saves him from advancing infantry
lines.name: English

lines.value: cao cao is defeated but liu bei must continue wandering
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 208 ad liu bei finds talent in a strategist known as zhuge liang who agreed to follow him after liu bei visited him three times
lines.name: English

lines.value: zhuge liang proves his worth by defeating cao cao's army in a series of ambushes at the battle of bo wan po and liu bei successfully manages to flee to sun jian in wu after the battle of changban where zhao yun saved his son
lines.name: English

lines.value: sun jian agrees to assist liu bei in his goal of defeating cao cao and wu strategist zhou yu teams up with zhuge liang to execute a fire attack that destroyed cao cao's fleet at the battle of chi bi
lines.name: English

lines.value: after chi bi liu bei focused on building up his kingdom
lines.name: English

lines.value: he took over luo castle from his cousin liu zhang after the people pleaded for his guidance although he lost pang tong and also unified jing province after defeating han xuan of changsha liu du of lingling zhao fan of guiyang and jin xuan of wuling
lines.name: English

lines.value: he gained huang zhong and wei yan as officers after this battle and his great army conquered the rest of yi province at chengdu in 214 ad soon after he assisted ma chao at the battle of tong pass tales against cao cao and gained him as a general after chengdu
lines.name: English

lines.value: liu bei then attacks either wei or wu depending on if the fire attack at chi bi succeeds or not
lines.name: English

lines.value: either wei or wu will be the final battle where you attack their capital the battles are the same
lines.name: English

lines.value: liu bei proceeds to campaign in the southlands to get rid of wu's threat as wu had backed a nanman rebellion by king meng huo
lines.name: English

lines.value: in nanzhong he systematically defeated meng huo for a total of seven times as zhuge liang cleverly resisted the nanman armor troops and also pacified the poison marshes
lines.name: English

lines.value: after taking down meng huo shu proceeded to capture fan castle from wei's cao ren and also defeated wu reinforcements under lu meng and traitors under mi fang and fu shiren
lines.name: English

lines.value: the final battle with wu was at the battle of yi ling where liu bei braved a wu fire attack and defeated if wu falls first kills sun jian and his officers
lines.name: English

lines.value: if wei has been defeated before wu liu bei proceeds to attack jianye and sees through sun jian's body double trickery and kills sun jian sun ce sun quan and sun shangxiang
lines.name: English

lines.value: he also attacks wei in campaigns masterminded by zhuge liang
lines.name: English

lines.value: zhuge liang gains jiang wei as a general after isolating him and tricking wei general ma zun into thinking that he was betraying him in a clever ploy at the battle of tianshui tales
lines.name: English

lines.value: he proceeds to defeat the wei after a failed prisoner exchange at the battle of mt dingjun and saves ma su from defeat at the battle of jieting
lines.name: English

lines.value: his final battle with wei is at the battle of wuzhang plains where he fakes his death only to ambush the wei forces and defeat sima yi
lines.name: English

lines.value: if wu has fallen before wei shu will attack xuchang the co capital of wei and take it with wei's officers fighting to the death
lines.name: English

lines.value: having united the land liu bei will ride on a victory march with his generals and enter the capital in a glorious procession
lines.name: English

lines.value: after dong zhuo's defeat cao cao focuses on uniting the land
lines.name: English

lines.value: he is surrounded by enemies dong zhuo's general lu bu has taken over all of dong zhuo's troops and taken xiapi castle zhang xiu has rebelled in wan castle to the north yuan shao threatened to swallow the north whole
lines.name: English

lines.value: cao cao defeated zhang xiu at wan castle with his guard dian wei holding foes back in the burning castle
lines.name: English

lines.value: cao cao having escaped defeats lu bu in alliance with liu bei at xiapi in 198 ad exterminating his army and gaining several officers
lines.name: English

lines.value: cao cao's final victory is at the battle of guandu in 200 ad where he destroys yuan shao's army before he even arrives
lines.name: English

lines.value: after defeating yuan shao cao cao proceeds to fight against liu bei who is wandering the land in search of a master
lines.name: English

lines.value: xiahou dun pursues and defeats guan yu liu bei's brother who is trying to escape to boats on the huang he tales
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 208 ad cao cao wins victories over zhuge liang's trickery at bo wan po defeats a fleeing liu bei at changban and stops a fire attack ploy by an allied fleet of sun jian and liu bei at chi bi.although his southern foes were still very alive cao cao focused to the north to crush ma chao and his rebels at tong gate in 211 ad tales
lines.name: English

lines.value: he also chooses to defend against lu bu who is terrorizing xiapi and in a fireattack he ends lu bu's offensive tales
lines.name: English

lines.value: cao cao's generals then destroy the army of the alive dong zhuo piecemeal at ji province tales and he eradicates all of his foes
lines.name: English

lines.value: cao cao then chooses to go after shu or wu depending on the result of the chibi fire attack
lines.name: English

lines.value: cao cao defends against shu's attacks with xiahou yuan defeating huang zhong at mt dingjun in 218 ad after a failed prisoner exchange
lines.name: English

lines.value: zhuge liang then makes a new attempt to go north appointing ma su as a subordinate but ma su is encircled at jieting in 229 ad and his army is decimated by sima yi cao cao's strategist
lines.name: English

lines.value: cao cao and sima yi then defeat zhuge liang at the wuzhang plains in 234 ad defeating or killing depending on order of conquest liu bei
lines.name: English

lines.value: if wu has fallen first cao cao proceeds to attack the shu capital of chengdu
lines.name: English

lines.value: he gets wei yan to defect to his forces and the wei army seizes both luo castle and chengdu from the shu forces and liu bei and his peasant militias are killed
lines.name: English

lines.value: wei strikes back against wu who have attacked them at fan castle
lines.name: English

lines.value: cao ren successfully defends the fortifications against lu meng who fails to lay siege layers against the walls
lines.name: English

lines.value: at shiting in 228 ad cao xiu narrowly survives a defection ploy by zhou fang with aid from sima yi who destroys lu xun's army
lines.name: English

lines.value: the final battle is at he fei castle where the wei general zhang liao defeats sun jian in a series of ambushes
lines.name: English

lines.value: if shu has been defeated first wei will attack the capital at jianye and every member of the sun family is killed as the three kingdoms come to an end
lines.name: English

lines.value: cao cao and his generals will then make a victory march into the capital waved at by local peasants
lines.name: English

lines.value: dong zhuo's defeat has left him holed up in luoyang so sun jian and his army attack and defeat him in the city finding the imperial seal in the process tales
lines.name: English

lines.value: sun jian then leads his army home but finds out that liu biao has taken over jing province yan baihu wang lang and liu yong have conquered the wu territory and liu xun has allied with yuan shu
lines.name: English

lines.value: at xiangyang in 192 ad sun jian falls into a trap in the castle but survives and defeats the attackers
lines.name: English

lines.value: his generals also kill off many of liu biao's generals and defeat yuan shao's reinforcements and liu biao is defeated after interrogating why he invaded jing
lines.name: English

lines.value: his son sun ce continues his conquest and proceeds to conquer the wu territory from the regional lords zhou yu plans his campaign for the lands
lines.name: English

lines.value: with wu secure the sun family continues on to mt xingshi where they attack jiangdong and defeat the armies of liu xun and yuan shu in 198 ad if only liu xun has been defeated sun jian and his family will participate in a unification of jing province securing all of the cities from the forces of liu biao and the three wu lords
lines.name: English

lines.value: with their home base secured wu looked to external threats
lines.name: English

lines.value: huang zu who had formerly supported liu biao prepared a pirate fleet to attack
lines.name: English

lines.value: nanman king meng huo had shown signs of revolt in the south
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the north cao cao prepared an armada to invade the south
lines.name: English

lines.value: sun ce and zhou yu defeated huang zu with a naval fire attack at xiakou and convinced gan ning to join them and zhou yu inflicted a decisive defeat on meng huo's elephant troops in nanman
lines.name: English

lines.value: to fix the problem with cao cao sun jian allied with liu bei and defeated cao cao's fleet at chi bi.after chi bi wu continued their conquests
lines.name: English

lines.value: depending on the result of the fire attack they will either attack wei or shu
lines.name: English

lines.value: before either the wu defeat dong zhuo and meng huo's combined forces at chang jiang tales
lines.name: English

lines.value: the wu secured xiangyang the nan territory jiangling and jing province from wei before shu's zhuge liang could and also defeated meng huo for a second or third time in the south
lines.name: English

lines.value: their final battle against shu is at yiling where they use a fire attack to force liu bei to retreat to bai di castle where he is then defeated or killed
lines.name: English

lines.value: if wei has fallen first wu will defeat the shu at chengdu and occupy the lands of shu han killing their officers
lines.name: English

lines.value: wu then faces off with wei taking fan castle with siege engines
lines.name: English

lines.value: lu xun a new strategists then defeats wei at shiting with a defection ploy involving zhou fang
lines.name: English

lines.value: their final victory at he fei castle gives them control of the region
lines.name: English

lines.value: if shu has fallen first the wu will proceed to xuchang and take it after a siege
lines.name: English

lines.value: with the land in their hands the wu have a victory march into the capital city
lines.name: English

lines.value: yuan shao having humbled the yellow turbans and the army of dong zhuo proceeded to attack his rival cao cao
lines.name: English

lines.value: after defeating cao cao at guan du yuan shao destroys wei and kills all of their generals
lines.name: English

lines.value: with the tyrant dead he focuses on defeating liu bei and sun jian
lines.name: English

lines.value: he fights two campaigns against them defeating sun jian at hefei and liu bei in xiapi
lines.name: English

lines.value: the two heroes deaths let him take control of the whole land
lines.name: English

lines.value: the nanman are absent from both the yellow turban campaign and the war against dong zhuo
lines.name: English

lines.value: instead they are living peacefully in the south but are defeated several times by shu invaders
lines.name: English

lines.value: king meng huo is infuriated but his wife zhu rong invigorates him to send them back to their lands and destroy them
lines.name: English

lines.value: after a single battle for nanzhong meng huo forces zhuge liang's army out of his home
lines.name: English

lines.value: meng huo's army marches northwards to attack liu bei
lines.name: English

lines.value: however his army is swept down the changjiang and end up in the kingdom of wu ruled by sun jian
lines.name: English

lines.value: the nanman resolve to take jianye from wu and meng huo kills every member of the sun family in rapid succession
lines.name: English

lines.value: with jianye down meng huo proceeds to attack into wei
lines.name: English

lines.value: he captures xuchang and kills every wei officer although sima yi's efforts to launch an attack on the nanman supply depot cause temporary chaos
lines.name: English

lines.value: meng huo and his nanman army then march on chengdu the shu capital
lines.name: English

lines.value: the nanman troops are held back from the bridges by zhang bao and guan suo who hold the nanman back to defend the legacy of their fathers zhang fei and guan yu respectively
lines.name: English

lines.value: meng huo kills the last of shu's generals and conquers the land
lines.name: English

lines.value: lu bu fights for dong zhuo at the battle of si shui gate fighting off invaders that are supposed to depose him
lines.name: English

lines.value: lu bu then defeats the coalition at hu lao gate but they are not done for yet
lines.name: English

lines.value: also he finds that dong zhuo is truly a monster and starts a revolt in wan castle and cuts him down
lines.name: English

lines.value: now in charge of dong zhuo's army he defeats cao cao liu bei and sun jian in several campaigns and takes over the land
lines.name: English

lines.value: dong zhuo learns that the coalition of yuan shao has finally started to attack and he defeats them at si shui gate and hu lao gate
lines.name: English

lines.value: afterwards he defeats lu bu who is trying to revolt against him and defeats the rebels
lines.name: English

lines.value: his final act is to destroy cao cao liu bei and sun jian at guandu xiapi and hefei
lines.name: English

lines.value: he rides into the capital on a victory march taking over the land
lines.name: English

lines.value: zhang jiao leader of the yellow turban rebellion finds out that the han army has moved at last and they are preparing to attack him
lines.name: English

lines.value: he defeats sun jian liu bei and cao cao in a series of campaigns at hefei xiapi and guandu respectively
lines.name: English

lines.value: he then defeats the han at xiapi castle held by huangfu song and then defeats zhu jun at he nan yin
lines.name: English

lines.value: finally he defeats the coalition including dong zhuo and lu bu in ji province and the han fall to his feet
lines.name: English

lines.value: his men enter the capital as the way of peace have taken over the land
lines.name: English

lines.value: due to the success of dynasty warriors 3 omega force began development on the sequel dynasty warriors 4 and its expansions
lines.name: English

lines.value: the fourth game in the series was the first to introduce an empires expansion but it wasn't designed by the same person who designed dynasty warriors 4 tomohiko sho
lines.name: English

lines.value: although he was not the designer for all of the dynasty warriors games he was involved in the production for them usually as the planner
lines.name: English

lines.value: omega force works under koei as an internal development team and have mainly concentrated on the dynasty warriors series and the samurai warriors series
lines.name: English

lines.value: similarities have been pointed out between the two series such as the xtreme legends and empires expansions as well as a similar voice cast that has been used throughout a number of the games from each series
lines.name: English

lines.value: repeated voices between games include beau billingslea steven jay blum and richard epcar
lines.name: English

lines.value: the dynasty warriors series has never used the musical style commonly made in the era that the games are set in
lines.name: English

lines.value: dynasty warriors 4 is no different and features a similar style of music to dynasty warriors 3 using a mix of rock metal and heavy metal with undertones of traditional chinese music
lines.name: English

lines.value: however this does not detract from the fact that there are a large number of varied tracks throughout the game
lines.name: English

lines.value: the ending song of the game cross colors is performed by chasen hallford and the music was composed by kazuhiro hara
lines.name: English

lines.value: the song was performed in both japanese and english by the same singer and was released for the us and japanese versions of the game
lines.name: English

lines.value: before its main release dynasty warriors 4 was already looking promising after gamespot uk's preview two months before the game was released
lines.name: English

lines.value: although still very similar to previous titles in the series the graphics engine had been tweaked and the gameplay been expanded featuring more characters and stages
lines.name: English

lines.value: after its release it had high sales rates in japan selling over one million copies a short time after release
lines.name: English

lines.value: its release in the us did not create as much hype as in japan mainly because the market for the dynasty warriors series is smaller there but it still sold fairly well and together with the japanese sales dynasty warriors 4 entered into the greatest hits charts
lines.name: English

lines.value: in its time dynasty warriors 4 has managed to become ign's 5th best co operative game on the ps2 as well
lines.name: English

lines.value: the game is criticized for being very similar to older games in the series and retaining some of the features such as the fogging and repetitive gameplay
lines.name: English

lines.value: even with these drawbacks koei went on to release two expansions for dynasty warriors 4 xtreme legends and dynasty warriors 4 empires
lines.name: English

lines.value: it had also been ported to the xbox and to the pc as a hyper edition
lines.name: English

lines.value: armchair empire commented that when there is a lot happening on screen at once the game tended to slow down the english voice acting for the series commonly criticized as being poor has remained in dw4
lines.name: English

lines.value: the english voice overs of dynasty warriors series uses straightforward english pronunciations for the romanized pinyin names of characters and locations
lines.name: English

lines.value: the results tend to leave errors in the dialogue with incorrect english pronunciations of originally chinese text
lines.name: English

lines.value: dynasty warriors 4 has had two expansions and a rerelease
lines.name: English

lines.value: the first was dynasty warriors 4 xtreme legends and added new gameplay options and modes
lines.name: English

lines.value: the second was dynasty warriors 4 empires which added a strategy mode of gameplay to the original
lines.name: English

lines.value: it has also been rereleased as in japan
lines.name: English

lines.value: hyper is a port of dynasty warriors 4 to windows 2000/windows xp
lines.name: English

lines.value: is a playstation 2 dynasty warriors 4 expansion developed by omega force and published by koei
lines.name: English

lines.value: this expansion was released in europe and the united states on november 4 2003
lines.name: English

lines.value: dw4xl as it is sometimes abbreviated has slightly improved weather effects and character reflections within the overall graphics
lines.name: English

lines.value: the original dw4 game disc is needed if the player wishes to play external modes such as musou mode the expansion adds new difficulty levels beginner and expert and new modes of play arena challenge and legend modes
lines.name: English

lines.value: in arena challenge mode the player can engage one on one duels against various opponents where they'll be rewarded if they win
lines.name: English

lines.value: the new legend mode elaborates on the individual prowess of each individual warrior within dynasty warriors
lines.name: English

lines.value: individual weapons are given the availability to have an 11th evolved state increasing the weapon's stats further
lines.name: English

lines.value: due to the great emphasis in the duelling system in this expansion it is at times seen as its own individual game separate from the original dynasty warriors 4
lines.name: English

lines.value: dynasty warriors 4 empires 3 empires shin sangokumusou 3 empires in japan is the second expansion of dynasty warriors 4 released exclusively for the playstation 2 on august 31 2004 in the united states and europe
lines.name: English

lines.value: the game adds a new strategy mode called empire mode which is based on the romance of the three kingdoms series
lines.name: English

lines.value: however the gameplay during attacking or defending against opposing forces is exactly the same as the original dynasty warriors 4
lines.name: English

lines.value: the main goal in empire mode is to conquer the land in order to beat the game by invading and conquering all areas and territories of china
lines.name: English

lines.value: in addition the japanese voices were added into the ps2 version of dynasty warriors 4 empires for the american version
lines.name: English

lines.value: in empire mode the player can choose a ruler for their forces along with two main generals
lines.name: English

lines.value: three minor lieutenants can also be chosen for support
lines.name: English

lines.value: in battle the capture of enemy officers is possible by lowering their morale and defeating them
lines.name: English

lines.value: if at the end of the battle the player is victorious it is possible to hire the captured officer or alternatively release them
lines.name: English

lines.value: before every battle the player is given the choice of using political tactics such as increasing or decreasing time limit of battles or preventing enemy reinforcements from arriving during battles
lines.name: English

lines.value: the player can also secure alliances with other forces these alliances can change how the game progresses such as requesting reinforcements from the allied forces against opposing forces
lines.name: English

lines.value: however these alliances only last for a set time decided by the tactic used
lines.name: English

lines.value: there's also an archives mode that shows the motions and voices of the officers
lines.name: English

lines.value: a gallery of character artworks and game movies is also presented within the archives mode
lines.name: English

lines.value: the pc version of the game hosts several exclusive features such as improved graphics higher resolution options more characters onscreen improved draw distance optional japanese dialogue and improved enemy ai
lines.name: English

lines.value: however it does not contain the additional content from dynasty warriors 4 xtreme legends
lines.name: English

lines.value: the austrian ice hockey championship in german osterreichische eishockey meister has been awarded to men since 1923 and for women since 1999
